instructions: Open FaceApp on your phone. Tap the gear icon in the upper left corner. Tap Go Pro . Select which subscription option you'd like to use. Open FaceApp on your phone, Tap the gear icon, Tap Go Pro and select a subscription option Tap Go Pro to pay for your FaceApp subscription. Tap the X in the upper left corner. Tap the toggle next to Watermark to remove it from future photos.
